about_the_game:
🎵 Idle Together - Original Soundtrack 🎵

Immerse yourself in the musical world of Idle Together with this official soundtrack featuring all the music from the game ! Enjoy captivating tracks that accompany your journey through the ages, blending strategy and relaxation.

By purchasing this OST, you’re not only getting an immersive experience outside the game, but you’re also directly supporting the development of Idle Together. Thank you for your support!

📀 Includes :
✔️ All in-game music in high quality
✔️ Listen freely, even outside the game
✔️ A way to contribute to the project’s growth

Your support makes all the difference. Enjoy the music ! 🎶
